name: AnamaliaAnarko
description:
Ever wanted to dual wield pistols AND be a capybara with your friends? Then boy do I have a game for you. 
A multiplayer game where you play as a dual wielding capybara capable of double jumping and walking upright! 

W - Forward
A - Left
S - Down
D - Right
Space - Jump & Double Jump
Left Mouse - Fire
R - Reload
Left Shift - Sprint
Left Stick Press - Sprint
Right Stick - Look
South Button - Jump
Right Trigger - Shoot
Button West - Reload
Left Stick - Movement
